query:
WITH "daily_data" AS
            (
              SELECT
                date_part('day', NOW() - DATE_TRUNC('day', "occurred_at")) AS times_ago,
                meditation_minutes,
                meditation_seconds
              FROM meditation
              WHERE guild_id = $1
            )
            SELECT
              "times_ago",
              (SUM(meditation_minutes) + (SUM(meditation_seconds) / 60)) AS meditation_minutes,
              COUNT(*) AS meditation_count
            FROM "daily_data"
            WHERE "times_ago" <= 12
            GROUP BY "times_ago"
